Text:
Wanderer, can you upload the GOG version of Rollercoaster Tycoon 2: Triple Thril pack?

There's a good torrent already for the base game (not GOG) but not the triple thrill pack and gog has easy installations too.

Thanks for your great work!
Could you also possibly upload Neverwinter Nights 2 and Icewind Dale 1 and 2 from GoG?
this is a great game.. tnx Wanderer..
